section.section: In this section the following words have the meanings indicated.
"License" has the meaning stated in § 17-101(g) of the Business Occupations and Professions Article.
"Provide real estate brokerage services" has the meaning stated in § 17-101(l) of the Business Occupations and Professions Article.

text.section: A foreclosure consultant who provides real estate brokerage services shall be licensed as required under Title 17 of the Business Occupations and Professions Article.
A foreclosure consultant shall present a copy of the license to a homeowner no later than the time a foreclosure consulting contract is executed.
